message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product of significant value. I'm confident it would be a great asset for your business. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. This represents a substantial opportunity for you to secure something truly valuable. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
